ISSUE.TITLE: Add option to change the GUI layout color
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY <!-- Briefly describe the problem or desired enhancement. --> Customer have DEV and PROD Ansible Towers and looking for option to change the GUI layout color to differentiate between them easily. Custom Logo for this scenario is not helpful as its only change in the login page.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4477 from ryanpetrello/372-signal-deadlock force worker processes to have a different signal handler from the parent
